name: Income Tax Law
description: This law establishes a federal income tax.

properties.Title: Federal Income Tax
properties.UserDescription:
First IF statement: For specialized citizens, this income tax uses a progressive percentage where the brackets and tax rates are configurable. The percentage of expenses (set to 0%) is also configurable.
Second IF Statement: For Zero-star citizens, this income tax uses a progressive percentage where the brackets and tax rates are configurable. This subtracts 100% of expenses. This section could be deleted and the set of conditions on the first IF statement removed to treat all citizens the same.

By default, expenses are store based purchases. This could be expanded as government sees fit.

Note: This law already accounts for company tax and companies. UBI and Loans are already excluded.
